context.rdfs:comment: A unique instance of a BroadcastService on a CableOrSatelliteService lineup.
context.rdfs:label: BroadcastChannel

properties.rdfs:comment: The unique address by which the BroadcastService can be identified in a provider lineup. In US, this is typically a number.
properties.rdfs:label: broadcastChannelId

properties.rdfs:comment: The type of service required to have access to the channel (e.g. Standard or Premium).
properties.rdfs:label: broadcastServiceTier

properties.rdfs:comment: The BroadcastService offered on this channel.
properties.rdfs:label: providesBroadcastService
